Question.Subject: I want to know about usage of Bsnl broadbad?
Question.Content: I am using BSNL broadband unlimited plan. I want know how much data I have downloaded till now. How can I know about usage till no. Please help me.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Go to data.bsnl.in and type ur protal id (not ur bsnl id but ur portal id , if u don't know ask the nearest bsnl office) and password. then select postpaid services tab and select the month for which u wanna se the usage.

Answer.Content: Go to data.bsnl.in and type ur protal id (not ur bsnl id but ur portal id , if u don't know ask the nearest bsnl office) and password. then select postpaid services tab and select the month for which u wanna se the usage.
